title: [1.8]一条命令创造一个游戏
author: 北美路人
txt_content:
本帖最后由 熄灭的火把 于 2014-12-17 08:11 编辑 

 制作出来的东西：

1*雷击弓
1*炸弹

渣视频：一条命令创造一个游戏

http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XODUwNDY4NDA4.html

代码部分：
只需要把这个指令输入到命令方块里面去能可以。

/summon FallingSand ~ ~1 ~ {Block:redstone_block,Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/fill ~-1 ~1 ~ ~-1 ~-8 ~ minecraft:redstone_block},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/fill ~-1 ~2 ~ ~0 ~-7 ~ minecraft:air},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/replaceitem entity @a slot.hotbar.1 minecraft:arrow 64 0 {HideFlags:127,ench:[{id:34,lvl:10}]}},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/setblock ~-4 ~-7 ~-3 minecraft:command_block 0 replace {Command:/gamerule doTileDrops false}},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/gamerule doTileDrops true},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/replaceitem entity @a slot.hotbar.0 minecraft:bow 1 0 {display:{Name:"雷击弓"},HideFlags:127,ench:[{id:34,lvl:10}]}},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/replaceitem entity @a slot.hotbar.8 minecraft:experience_bottle 1 0 {display:{Name:"炸弹"},HideFlags:127,ench:[{id:34,lvl:10}]}},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/tellraw @a[r=200] {text:" 完成咯!",italic:true,color:white}},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:quartz_block,Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/execute @e[type=PrimedTnt,name=bomb] ~ ~ ~ /summon LightningBolt ~ ~ ~},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:redstone_block,Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/fill ~-1 ~1 ~ ~-1 ~-12 ~ minecraft:redstone_block},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/fill ~-1 ~2 ~ ~0 ~-11 ~ minecraft:air},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/setblock ~ ~-10 ~-1 minecraft:unpowered_comparator 2},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/setblock ~-11 ~-8 ~-3 minecraft:command_block 0 destroy {Command:/gamerule doTileDrops true}},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/setblock ~-11 ~-8 ~-3 minecraft:command_block 0 destroy {Command:/replaceitem entity @a slot.hotbar.8 minecraft:experience_bottle 1 0 {display:{Name:"炸弹"},HideFlags:127,ench:[{id:34,lvl:10}]}}},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/setblock ~-6 ~-6 ~-3 minecraft:command_block 0 destroy {Command:/execute @p ~ ~ ~ /spreadplayers ~ ~ 8 20 false @e[type=PrimedTnt,name=bomb]}},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/setblock ~-6 ~-6 ~-3 minecraft:command_block 0 destroy {Command:/kill @e[type=FallingSand]}},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/setblock ~-4 ~-5 ~-4 minecraft:command_block 0 destroy {Command:/kill @e[type=XPOrb]}},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/setblock ~-4 ~-4 ~-2 minecraft:command_block 0 destroy {Command:/execute @p ~ ~ ~ /summon PrimedTnt ~ ~ ~ {Fuse:50,CustomName:"bomb",Riding:{id:FallingSand,Riding:{id:PrimedTnt,CustomName:"bomb",Fuse:50,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Riding:{id:PrimedTnt,CustomName:"bomb",Fuse:50,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Riding:{id:PrimedTnt,CustomName:"bomb",Fuse:50,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Riding:{id:PrimedTnt,CustomName:"bomb",Fuse:50,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Riding:{id:PrimedTnt,CustomName:"bomb",Fuse:50,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Riding:{id:PrimedTnt,CustomName:"bomb",Fuse:50,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Riding:{id:PrimedTnt,CustomName:"bomb",Fuse:50,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Riding:{id:PrimedTnt,CustomName:"bomb",Fuse:50}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/setblock ~-4 ~-3 ~-3 minecraft:command_block 0 destroy {Command:/scoreboard players set @a bombs 0}},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/setblock ~-4 ~-1 ~-3 minecraft:command_block 0 destroy {Command:/clear @a minecraft:experience_bottle}},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/setblock ~-4 ~-1 ~-3 minecraft:command_block 0 destroy {Command:/kill @e[type=ThrownExpBottle]}},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/setblock ~-2 ~ ~-3 minecraft:command_block 0 destroy {Command:/testfor @a[score_bombs_min=1]}},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:redstone_block,Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/fill ~-1 ~1 ~ ~-1 ~-6 ~ minecraft:redstone_block},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/fill ~-1 ~2 ~ ~0 ~-5 ~ minecraft:air},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/setblock ~-5 ~-4 ~-3 minecraft:unpowered_repeater 3},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/fill ~-7 ~-3 ~-3 ~-10 ~-3 ~-3 minecraft:unpowered_repeater 15},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/fill ~-1 ~-2 ~-3 ~-3 ~-2 ~-3 minecraft:unpowered_comparator 3},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/scoreboard objectives add bombs stat.useItem.minecraft.experience_bottle bombs},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/fill ~ ~-1 ~ ~ ~-1 ~-1 minecraft:quartz_block},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:redstone_block,Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/fill ~-1 ~1 ~ ~-1 ~-13 ~ /summon PrimedTnt ~ ~-1 ~ {Fuse:5}}},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/setblock ~10 ~-10 ~-3 minecraft:command_block 0 destroy {Command:/gamerule doTileDrops true}},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/setblock ~6 ~-9 ~-3 minecraft:command_block 0 destroy {Command:/execute @e[type=Arrow,c=5] ~ ~ @e[type=Arrow]}},Time:1,DropItem:0,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,TileEntityData:{Command:/fill ~7 ~-7 ~-3 ~9 ~-7 ~-3 minecraft:unpowered_repeater
